name: Shimla
description: The Queen of Hills, Shimla is a beautiful hill station in Himachal Pradesh known for its colonial architecture, scenic views, and pleasant climate.
bestTimeToVisit: March to June, September to November

name: Goa
description: India's party capital, Goa is famous for its beaches, nightlife, and Portuguese heritage.

name: Kerala
description: God's Own Country, Kerala is known for its backwaters, beaches, and rich cultural heritage.

name: Rajasthan
description: The Land of Kings, Rajasthan is famous for its majestic forts, palaces, and vibrant culture.

name: Ladakh
description: The Land of High Passes, Ladakh offers breathtaking landscapes, Buddhist monasteries, and adventure activities.

name: Rameshwaram
description: A sacred island town in Tamil Nadu, known for its Ramanathaswamy Temple and pristine beaches.

name: Varanasi
description: One of the oldest living cities in the world, Varanasi is a spiritual hub on the banks of the Ganges.

name: Darjeeling
description: Famous for its tea gardens, toy train, and stunning views of the Kanchenjunga mountain range.
bestTimeToVisit: March to May, September to November

name: Munnar
description: A picturesque hill station in Kerala, known for its sprawling tea plantations and cool climate.

name: Andaman & Nicobar
description: A tropical paradise with pristine beaches, coral reefs, and rich marine life.
